about_me.des: Arhitect, Developer, Director, Cyclist, general Geek.  I enjoy coding and discovering technology, riding my bikes and enjoying time with my family.

projects.specialized: Specialized.com is an API driven site for one of the largest and best bicycle brands in the world.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.specialized_des: Director / Architect and Developer for Specialized Bicycles. With a team of 7, responsible for all .com, internal and other customer and internal facing tools and sites.
career.speaktech_des: Development Manager, Solutions Architect and Sr Developer for top tech consulting firm. Provided best in class solutions for companies in industries varying from Entertainment to Aerospace to Insurance.
career.meggitt_des: Joined as part of a 2-year project building a Business Intelligence Solution for consolidating reporting and vision from 16 independent aerospace companies.
career.universal_des: Lead developer for team of developers supporting NBC Universal Theme Parks as well as TV and Film.
career.prior_des: Various IT/Development positions which served as stepping stones and ladders to climb. Optical Industry, Emergency Responders, Bugle Boy Jeans etc.
